title: For Riot
body:
Here is a list of some bugs that have been appearing in my games
Don't how or why they happen
and some are simple visual things while others are game breaking ones
I don't know what is important to know so here goes the things I think might be relevant
Lenovo Y50 with Windows 8
NOTE: I list them by the characters I was playing when they happened, not saying it's because of those champions

Now for the bugs:

Riot Girl Tristana:
Level Low -> her dance has the cannon glued to her hand instead of up to the side
Level HIGH -> Having her and DJ sona in the same game causes horrible freezing and sometimes crashing, happened multiple times but only when DJ sona was present

Aatrox (Pirate):
Not sure if the bugs are because of the skin but it was the one I was using when they happened
 Level Medium -> Having typhon and Sated devourer makes it so you don't play the healing/damage animation on W only the devourer one, I wasn't sure if I was even procking his 3rd hit because of the lack of animation or sound effect, more of a quality of life I know but still
Level High -> the reason why I couldn't tell if I was procking by the heal was the fact that during the entire game I had major image freezing and crashed twice so I barely could see the life bar moving
Level Low -> Menu items on the lower case had multiple images stacked on top of each other, overlapping by about 5 pixels up

Gangplank (Aram):
Not sure if this is a bug or on purpose but still gonna list just in case
Level Medium: Gangplank gets passive krakens at an alarming rate in aram (above 1000 in 25 minutes)

That's all
Hope this helps in some way on improving the game ^^

Level Low -> her dance has the cannon glued to her hand instead of up to the side

> Level HIGH -> Having her and DJ sona in the same game causes horrible freezing and sometimes crashing, happened multiple times but only when DJ sona was present

This is a champion bug, and is not skin related, just as a heads up! ^-^

Edition: Windows 8
Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4720HQ CPU @ 2.60GHz 2.60 GHz
Ram: 8.00 GB

* The DirectX Diagnostic Tool will open. Press the "Save All Information..." button.
* Choose where to save the file (for example, your desktop)
